summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the north and south alley in Block 8, Plat of Columbia being the alley between 37th Avenue South and Rainier Avenue, from Ferdinand Street and Edmunds Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9468 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
